scripts.unitDied:
unitB = lastDeadUnitKiller() unitA = lastDeadUnit()
x = getRandomGen(30, 216) y = getRandomGen(42, 226)
if lastDeadUnitCauseOfDeath() ~= 3 then
if unitFaction(unitB) ~= unitFaction(unitA) then
if unitFaction(unitA) ~= 0 then
if lastDeadUnitName() == 'rabbit' then
giveResource('food', unitFaction(unitB), 12) createUnit('rabbit', unitFaction(unitA), {x, y})
end end end end
if lastDeadUnitCauseOfDeath() ~= 3 then
if unitFaction(unitB) ~= unitFaction(unitA) then
if unitFaction(unitA) ~= 0 then
if lastDeadUnitName() == 'duck' then
giveResource('food', unitFaction(unitB), 18) createUnit('duck', unitFaction(unitA), {x, y})
end end end end
if lastDeadUnitCauseOfDeath() ~= 3 then
if unitFaction(unitB) ~= unitFaction(unitA) then
if unitFaction(unitA) ~= 0 then
if lastDeadUnitName() == 'turtle' then
giveResource('food', unitFaction(unitB), 23) createUnit('turtle', unitFaction(unitA), {x, y})
end end end end
if lastDeadUnitCauseOfDeath() ~= 3 then
if unitFaction(unitB) ~= unitFaction(unitA) then
if unitFaction(unitA) ~= 0 then
if lastDeadUnitName() == 'deer' then
giveResource('food', unitFaction(unitB), 50) createUnit('deer', unitFaction(unitA), {x, y})
end end end end
if lastDeadUnitCauseOfDeath() ~= 3 then
if unitFaction(unitB) ~= unitFaction(unitA) then
if unitFaction(unitA) ~= 0 then
if lastDeadUnitName() == 'wolf' then
giveResource('food', unitFaction(unitB), 55) createUnit('wolf', unitFaction(unitA), {x, y})
end end end end
if lastDeadUnitCauseOfDeath() ~= 3 then
if unitFaction(unitB) ~= unitFaction(unitA) then
if unitFaction(unitA) ~= 0 then
if lastDeadUnitName() == 'lion' then
giveResource('food', unitFaction(unitB), 60) createUnit('lion', unitFaction(unitA), {x, y})
end end end end
if lastDeadUnitCauseOfDeath() ~= 3 then
if unitFaction(unitB) ~= unitFaction(unitA) then
if unitFaction(unitA) ~= 0 then
if lastDeadUnitName() == 'alligator' then
giveResource('food', unitFaction(unitB), 70) createUnit('alligator', unitFaction(unitA), {x, y})
end end end end
if lastDeadUnitCauseOfDeath() ~= 3 then
if unitFaction(unitB) ~= unitFaction(unitA) then
if unitFaction(unitA) ~= 0 then
if lastDeadUnitName() == 'bear' then
giveResource('food', unitFaction(unitB), 80) createUnit('alligator', unitFaction(unitA), {x, y})
end end end end
if lastDeadUnitCauseOfDeath() ~= 3 then
if unitFaction(unitB) ~= unitFaction(unitA) then
if unitFaction(unitA) ~= 0 then
if lastDeadUnitName() == 'triceratops' then
giveResource('food', unitFaction(unitB), 100) createUnit('alligator', unitFaction(unitA), {x, y})
end end end end
if lastDeadUnitCauseOfDeath() ~= 3 then
if unitFaction(unitB) ~= unitFaction(unitA) then
if unitFaction(unitA) == 0 then
if lastDeadUnitName() == 'rabbit' then
giveResource('food', unitFaction(unitB), 12) createUnit('rabbit', 0, {x, y}) setCameraPosition({x, y})
end end end end
if lastDeadUnitCauseOfDeath() ~= 3 then
if unitFaction(unitB) ~= unitFaction(unitA) then
if unitFaction(unitA) == 0 then
if lastDeadUnitName() == 'duck' then
giveResource('food', unitFaction(unitB), 18) createUnit('duck', 0, {x, y}) setCameraPosition({x, y})
end end end end
if lastDeadUnitCauseOfDeath() ~= 3 then
if unitFaction(unitB) ~= unitFaction(unitA) then
if unitFaction(unitA) == 0 then
if lastDeadUnitName() == 'turtle' then
giveResource('food', unitFaction(unitB), 23) createUnit('turtle', 0, {x, y}) setCameraPosition({x, y})
end end end end
if lastDeadUnitCauseOfDeath() ~= 3 then
if unitFaction(unitB) ~= unitFaction(unitA) then
if unitFaction(unitA) == 0 then
if lastDeadUnitName() == 'deer' then giveResource('food', unitFaction(unitB), 50) createUnit('deer', 0, {x, y}) setCameraPosition({x, y})
end end end end
if lastDeadUnitCauseOfDeath() ~= 3 then
if unitFaction(unitB) ~= unitFaction(unitA) then
if unitFaction(unitA) == 0 then
if lastDeadUnitName() == 'wolf' then giveResource('food', unitFaction(unitB), 55) createUnit('wolf', 0, {x, y}) setCameraPosition({x, y})
end end end end
if lastDeadUnitCauseOfDeath() ~= 3 then
if unitFaction(unitB) ~= unitFaction(unitA) then
if unitFaction(unitA) == 0 then
if lastDeadUnitName() == 'lion' then
giveResource('food', unitFaction(unitB), 60) createUnit('lion', 0, {x, y}) setCameraPosition({x, y})
end end end end
if lastDeadUnitCauseOfDeath() ~= 3 then
if unitFaction(unitB) ~= unitFaction(unitA) then
if unitFaction(unitA) == 0 then
if lastDeadUnitName() == 'alligator' then
giveResource('food', unitFaction(unitB), 70) createUnit('alligator', 0, {x, y}) setCameraPosition({x, y})
end end end end
if lastDeadUnitCauseOfDeath() ~= 3 then
if unitFaction(unitB) ~= unitFaction(unitA) then
if unitFaction(unitA) == 0 then
if lastDeadUnitName() == 'bear' then
giveResource('food', unitFaction(unitB), 80) createUnit('alligator', 0, {x, y}) setCameraPosition({x, y})
end end end end
if lastDeadUnitCauseOfDeath() ~= 3 then
if unitFaction(unitB) ~= unitFaction(unitA) then
if unitFaction(unitA) == 0 then
if lastDeadUnitName() == 'triceratops' then
giveResource('food', unitFaction(unitB), 100) createUnit('alligator', 0, {x, y}) setCameraPosition({x, y})
if lastDeadUnitCauseOfDeath() ~= 3 then
if unitFaction(unitB) ~= unitFaction(unitA) then
if lastDeadUnitName() == 'rabbit' then
giveResource('food', unitFaction(unitB), 12)
elseif lastDeadUnitName() == 'duck' then
giveResource('food', unitFaction(unitB), 25)
elseif lastDeadUnitName() == 'turtle' then
giveResource('food', unitFaction(unitB), 40)
elseif lastDeadUnitName() == 'deer' then
giveResource('food', unitFaction(unitB), 150)
elseif lastDeadUnitName() == 'wolf' then
giveResource('food', unitFaction(unitB), 200)
elseif lastDeadUnitName() == 'lion' then
giveResource('food', unitFaction(unitB), 250)
elseif lastDeadUnitName() == 'alligator' then
giveResource('food', unitFaction(unitB), 300)
elseif lastDeadUnitName() == 'bear' then
giveResource('food', unitFaction(unitB), 400)
elseif lastDeadUnitName() == 'triceratops' then
giveResource('food', unitFaction(unitB), 800)
end end end end
end end end
